item.title: UFO sightings in Belarus
item.description:
UFO Sightings in Belarus ðŸ”—

This article documents alleged sightings of Unidentified Flying Objects (UFOs) in Belarus.

1985 ðŸ”—

This section details a specific UFO sighting reported in 1985. An Aeroflot plane, flying from Tbilisi to Tallinn, reported seeing a bright light while flying over Minsk.

See also ðŸ”—

This section provides a link to the main article, “List of reported UFO sightings,” for broader context and information on UFO sightings globally.

References ðŸ”—

This section lists the source cited in the article. The reference is an Associated Press article from April 1985 titled “UFOs or Space Rubbish? Soviet News Reports Differ.”

External links ðŸ”—

This section provides an external link to the MUFON (Mutual UFO Network) website, specifically to a page displaying the last 20 UFO sightings and pictures reported to the organization.

UFOs Template ðŸ”—

This section contains a navigation template related to UFOs. It includes links to various topics related to ufology, claimed sightings, confirmed hoaxes, sightings by country, types of UFOs, alleged extraterrestrial beings, studies and timelines, hypotheses, conspiracy theories, alien involvement, culture, skepticism, and government & law. It also includes a link to the category page for Unidentified Flying Objects.

source: https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/UFO_sightings_in_Belarus
